artificiallifefx

Class ArtificialLifeFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • artificiallifefx.ArtificialLifeFX

  • public class ArtificialLifeFX
extends javafx.application.Application
    This is the static main class of the function that stores the static instance of AWorld and the instance of UI. It also has the animation timers to update the world and move the entities as well as triggers the chain of functions that returns the completed UI. Also stores all the global instances of DEFAULT_PADDING, DEFAULT_INSET and the boolean "running".

      • fromText

        public static AWorld fromText(int xSize,
                              int ySize,
                              double foodPercent,
                              double obststaclePercent,
                              int ants,
                              int bees)
        Turns an input string into a generated world. Input string is broken into integers and doubles already
        Parameters:
        xSize - xSize of world
        ySize - ySize of world
        foodPercent - Percentage of the world that should be food
        obststaclePercent - Percentage of the world that should be obstacles
        ants - Number of ants
        bees - Number of bees
        Returns:
        The completed world with entities
